content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE: Full Circle*** was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on February 25, 2022, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background A [ONE Middleweight World Championship](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#ONE_Middleweight_World_Championship) bout between reigning champion [Reinier de Ridder](/wiki/Reinier_de_Ridder) and title challenger Kiamrian Abbasov was scheduled as the main event. Two additional title fights were later added as well a [ONE Light Heavyweight Kickboxing World Championship](/wiki/ONE_Light_Heavyweight_Kickboxing_World_Championship) bout between the champion [Roman Kryklia](/wiki/Roman_Kryklia) and challenger [Murat Aygun](/wiki/Murat_Aygun), as well as a [ONE Featherweight Muay Thai World Championship](/wiki/ONE_Featherweight_Muay_Thai_World_Championship) between champion [Petchmorakot Petchyindee](/wiki/Petchmorakot_Petchyindee_Academy) and challenger Jamal Yusupov. Jamal Yusupov and [David Branch](/wiki/David_Branch_(fighter)), but the two veterans have been forced to withdraw from their respective matchups. ## Results Main Card (YouTube / ONE Super App)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesMiddleweight[Reinier de Ridder](/wiki/Reinier_de_Ridder) (c)def.Kiamrian AbbasovSubmission (arm-triangle choke)30:57[a]Light Heavyweight Kickboxing[Roman Kryklia](/wiki/Roman_Kryklia) (c)def.[Murat Aygün](/wiki/Murat_Ayg%C3%BCn)KO (body kick and punches)12:32[b]Catchweight (209.4 lbs)[Vitaly Bigdash](/wiki/Vitaly_Bigdash)def.[Aung La Nsang](/wiki/Aung_La_Nsang)Decision (unanimous)35:00[c]Featherweight Kickboxing[Tayfun Özcan](/wiki/Tayfun_%C3%96zcan)def.[Enriko Kehl](/wiki/Enriko_Kehl)Decision (unanimous)33:00Heavyweight Kickboxing[Guto Inocente](/wiki/Guto_Inocente)def.Bruno SusanoTKO (referee stoppage)22:22Bantamweight[Fabrício Andrade](/wiki/Fabr%C3%ADcio_Andrade)def.Jeremy PacatiwKO (knee to the body)11:37Lead Card (YouTube / Facebook / ONE Super App)Catchweight (192.4 lbs)Zebaztian Kadestamdef.Valmir da SilvaKO (punches)11:26[d]Bantamweight Muay ThaiVladimir Kuzmindef.Chris ShawDecision (unanimous)33:00Catchweight (128 lbs) Muay Thai[Smilla Sundell](/wiki/Smilla_Sundell)def.Diandra MartinTKO (punch)31:35WelterweightDaniyal Zainalovdef.[Yuri Simões](/wiki/Yuri_Sim%C3%B5es)Decision (split)35:00Flyweight Kickboxing[Daniel Puertas Gallardo](/wiki/Daniel_Puertas_Gallardo)def.Jiduo YiboDecision (split)33:00LightweightDrex Zamboangadef.Rahul RajuKO (punches)11:05 ## Bonus awards The following fighters received $50,000 bonuses. - **Performance of the Night: Reinier de Ridder** and **Roman Kryklia** - Martial Arts portal - [2022 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
title: ONE: Full Circle
